cms.query.QueryText:
--DECLARE @RoomID INT --SET @RoomID = 30 --DECLARE @ChatUserID INT --SET @ChatUserID = 30
DECLARE @Now DATETIME SET @Now = GETDATE()
UPDATE Chat_SupportTakenRoom SET [ChatSupportTakenRoomLastModification] = @Now, [ChatSupportTakenRoomResolvedDateTime] = @Now, [ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID] = NULL WHERE [ChatSupportTakenRoomRoomID] = @RoomID AND [ChatSupportTakenRoomChatUserID] = @ChatUserID
